mapper.select: SELECT mns.no, mns.compid, mns.manuid, mn.manuname, mn.manubiztype, mn.productprice FROM (SELECT mns.no, mns.compid, mns.manuid, mn.manuname, mn.manubiztype, mn.productprice,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY mns.no DESC) AS RNUM FROM manuscrap mns, manufacturer mn) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY mns.no DESC
SELECT mns.no, mns.compid, mns.manuid, mn.manuname, mn.manubiztype, mn.productprice FROM manuscrap mns, manufacturer mn WHERE compid = #{compid} and mns.manuid = mn.id order by no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manuscrap(no, compid, manuid) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1,0) FROM manuscrap), #{compid}, #{manuid})
